<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## isObject() function

Checks if value is the type of object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isObject: <T>(input: T) => input is T & object
```



## Example


```ts
isObject({}); // true
isObject([1, 2, 3]); // true
isObject(() => {}); // true
isObject(null); // false
isObject(123); // false
```


[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/isObject.ts)
